objects.description: [Industroyer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0001)'s OPC module can brute force values and will send out a 0x01 status which for the target systems equates to a Primary Variable Out of Limits misdirecting operators from understanding protective relay status. (Citation: Anton Cherepanov, ESET June 2017)

external_references.description: Anton Cherepanov, ESET 2017, June 12 Win32/Industroyer: A new threat for industrial control systems Retrieved. 2017/09/15
